sourcesContent:
<template>
  <button v-on:click="changeState">Turn {{ btnState }}</button>
</template>
<script>
import io from "socket.io-client";

export default {
  name: "NavBar",
  data() {
    return {
      btnState: "On",
      socket: {}
    };
  },
  mounted: () => {
    console.log(`Initialating sockets: ${  }`)
    this.socket = io("http://localhost:3001")
    let clientData = {
      "clientType" : "client",
      "socket" : this.socket.id,
    }
    this.socket.emit("client-type", clientData);
  },
  methods: {
    changeState() {
      let data = {
        "socket": this.socket,
        "btnState": this.btnState
      };
      console.log("changing btn state...");
      this.socket.emit("change-state", data);
      this.socket.on("current-led-state", (data) => {
        this.btnState = data.body["btnState"];
      });
    }
  }
};
</script>
